div.h2: Reasons for rejecting a diagnostic order
div.p: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system for reasons of rejecting a diagnostic order. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416406003 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 428119001 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416064006 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416432009 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183944003 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 281260000 and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410521004

name.value: Reasons for rejecting a diagnostic order

publisher.value: HL7 Clinical Quality Information (CQI) Work Group
